it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class TargetParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.TargetParameter

  • public class TargetParameter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the target of the effect of the weapon or powerup

    • Field Summary

      • TargetParameter

        public TargetParameter(Square movement,
                       Player owner,
                       Player enemyPlayer,
                       Room targetRoom,
                       Square targetSquare,
                       java.lang.String typeOfFire)
        This constructor instantiates the target parameter
        Parameters:
        movement - This parameter defines the position where the target of the effect will be
        owner - This parameter defines the player that owns the weapon or power up used
        enemyPlayer - This parameter defines the enemy player that is targeted by the owner
        targetRoom - This parameter defines the room that is targeted
        targetSquare - This parameter defines the square that is targeted
        typeOfFire - This parameter defines the type of fire of the weapon
